title: Stock Prediction
description: This project aims to predict stock prices using historical data and machine learning algorithms. The primary goal is to develop a predictive model that can assist investors in making informed decisions.

title: Blog Application
description: This project is made for users to create and manage their blog posts, allowing for rich content creation. Users can easily upload images using Multer, enhancing their posts with visual elements.

title: School Management System API
description: This API is designed to facilitate comprehensive management of school data, providing functionalities for adding new schools and retrieving a list of nearby institutions based on geographical coordinates.
